name: ricardo-fenochietto-website
description: Personal website for Ricardo Fenochietto - Economist & Author

scripts.start: npm run build && echo 'Build completed! Open index.html in your browser'
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run build && echo 'Setup completed! Project ready to use.'
scripts.help: echo 'Available commands: npm run build | npm run sass | npm run deploy | npm run clean'

author: Ricardo Fenochietto
